name: Windows Manage Set Port Forwarding With PortProxy
author: Borja Merino <bmerinofe@gmail.com>
description:
This module uses the PortProxy interface from netsh to set up
        port forwarding persistently (even after reboot). PortProxy
        supports TCP IPv4 and IPv6 connections.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: LOCAL_ADDRESS
options.description: IPv4/IPv6 address to which to listen.

options.name: CONNECT_ADDRESS
options.description: IPv4/IPv6 address to which to connect.

options.name: CONNECT_PORT
options.description: Port number to which to connect.

options.name: LOCAL_PORT
options.description: Port number to which to listen.

options.name: IPV6_XP
options.description: Install IPv6 on Windows XP (needed for v4tov4).

options.name: TYPE
options.description: Type of forwarding (Accepted: v4tov4, v6tov6, v6tov4, v4tov6)
